title: Simplify item_secret.xml and add spacing on the right of item_actions to prevent…
message:
Simplify item_secret.xml and add spacing on the right of item_actions to prevent tapping near it from triggering fast scroll
Also add android:singleLine="true", although it is marked as deprecated. Without it, lines that don't fit and contain e.g. a plus sign will be cut-off from there.

message: Prevent CursorIndexOutOfBoundsException when tapping two secrets in rapid succession: prevent execution of callbacks for ongoing api calls

Replace PopupMenu with ListPopupWindow so it still works: ForwardListener no longer returns the inner ListPopupWindow.

Show SSL exception message when no connection to the server could be made (to prevent trying you to get you to believe there is no internet connection).

Re-format code base by Android Studio (incl. XML).
